name: latitude
description: This represents the latitude of the building polygon centroid.

name: longitude
description: This represents the longitude of the building polygon centroid.

name: area_in_meters
description: This represents the area in square meters of the polygon.

name: confidence
description: This represents the confidence score [0.5;1.0] assigned by the model.

name: geometry
description: This represents the building polygon in the WKT format (POLYGON).

name: full_plus_code
description: This represents the full Plus Code(latitude longitude based) at the building polygon centroid.
